name: PrayerTracker
0:
”Alexa, open prayer tracker”
”Alexa, open prayer tracker and enter setup mode”
”Remove John from the family”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prayer tracker
des: This Skill makes it very easy to know whose turn is next for family prayer. Start out by adding family members. Then just say "Alexa, open prayer tracker"
